scripts.setup-pipeline: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name pogpool-prepare --template-file pipelineAccount/prepare.yml --parameter-overrides ProjectName=pogpool-pipeline StagingAccount=123401599814 ProdAccount=449173632946 --profile starcopipeline --region=us-east-1
scripts.deploy-staging-deployer: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name pipeline-pogpool-role --template-file stagingAccount/deployer.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides PipelineAccount=000350007669 CMKARN=arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:000350007669:key/640be72a-d2e5-4c40-a01d-18d7f76a9064 S3Bucket=pogpool-prepare-artifactbucket-78lq06k3mnoa --profile=starcostaging --region=us-east-1
scripts.deploy-prod-deployer: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name pipeline-pogpool-role --template-file prodAccount/deployer.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides PipelineAccount=000350007669 CMKARN=arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:000350007669:key/640be72a-d2e5-4c40-a01d-18d7f76a9064 S3Bucket=pogpool-prepare-artifactbucket-78lq06k3mnoa --profile=starcoprod --region=us-east-1
scripts.deploy-pipeline: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name pogpool-pipeline --template-file pipelineAccount/pipeline.yml --parameter-overrides ProjectName=pogpool-pipeline StagingAccount=123401599814 ProdAccount=449173632946 CMKARN=arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:000350007669:key/640be72a-d2e5-4c40-a01d-18d7f76a9064 S3Bucket=pogpool-prepare-artifactbucket-78lq06k3mnoa --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --profile starcopipeline --region=us-east-1
scripts.add-permissions-to-key: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name pogpool-prepare --template-file pipelineAccount/prepare.yml --parameter-overrides ProjectName=pogpool-pipeline StagingAccount=123401599814 ProdAccount=449173632946 CodeBuildCondition=true --profile starcopipeline --region=us-east-1
scripts.add-permissions-to-cross-accounts: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name pogpool-pipeline --template-file pipelineAccount/pipeline.yml --parameter-overrides ProjectName=pogpool-pipeline StagingAccount=123401599814 ProdAccount=449173632946 CMKARN=arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:000350007669:key/640be72a-d2e5-4c40-a01d-18d7f76a9064 S3Bucket=pogpool-prepare-artifactbucket-78lq06k3mnoa CrossAccountCondition=true --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --profile starcopipeline --region=us-east-1
